getForm(String).

9fdff43f3813e0c63b905e3b3630a47ff18241ae.commit.message:
Changed parameters variable to Map instead of HashMap so we can 
change implementation later without breaking subclasses.

8f1897a0d33a35eca7d1a86c292714b7462f68f0.commit.message:
Replaced Validator.*_KEY constants with *_PARAM to match new 
semantics.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@140007 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
8f1897a0d33a35eca7d1a86c292714b7462f68f0.commit.author.name: David Graham

5ec694333acc55f3dace4921df722dcc4b6f9e77.commit.message:
Deprecated Constant class as it is never really used.  Deprecated various 
methods like addConstantParam and addVarParam to shortened versions like 
addConstant.  Removed unneeded null checking and checking for properties
being set that are guaranteed by the DTD to be set.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@140006 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

64b90f0c957f6b1a7b88d5897469f1ee41a53473.commit.message:
Catch NumberFormatException instead of Exception and document 
places that swallow exceptions.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@140005 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
64b90f0c957f6b1a7b88d5897469f1ee41a53473.commit.author.name: David Graham

f20be31249454bc2fdaa124b6fc6d886ba04c402.commit.message:
Strings do not need to be copied in clone() methods because whenever
you change the value it points to a separate String instance and doesn't
modify the other pointers.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@140004 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
f20be31249454bc2fdaa124b6fc6d886ba04c402.commit.author.name: David Graham

25ff58b89156947d1513ed8648b3796bd23c1c3e.commit.message:
Deprecated the existing Arg structure which only allowed 4 message 
replacement arguments.  This also put an undue burden on clients when
trying to retrieve arguments.  There is a new <arg> element with a 
"position" attribute and the existing <arg0> - <arg3> elements are 
deprecated.


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/validator/trunk@140003 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
25ff58b89156947d1513ed8648b3796bd23c1c3e.commit.author.name: David Graham

PR# 18689.
